item.title: X-CubeSat Data
item.author: antoine.tavant@polytechnique.edu (Antoine Tavant)
item.description: We got a lot of data, there are some. The figures are generated with Bokeh, using JavaScript for the interactivity. You need the allow the third party sources to see them. To add a figure in a similare static page, see this guid. Temperature of the batterie We measured the temperature of the satellites from our ground station. The most interesting one is the battery temperature. The Ground station had some issues, hence the missing points.
